text: mama hondata fit – iwath karanna sadharana hethuwak naha – lasith malinga kata ariyi!
sinahawa nathara wune winadiyakatath adu welawakadi..

eya hondata purudu wuwayin pasu ee dhyana thaththwayen nagi sitinawa.ese nagi sita thamata athiwu aakinnynyayathana dhyana sithe aakaraya sihi karanawa.

adhirajyawadaya dakwa loka dhanawadaya gihilla thiyana yugayaka api wage ratawala karya bharaya wenne kendraya sadaha amudrawya sapayima ha kendraye nimi drawya walata weladapolak wima.kendrayath paridhiyath athara hadila thiyana me sabadathawaya wisin kendraye wage nishpadanaya padanam wuna diyunu dhanawadayak paridhiye sanwardhanaya wimata thiyana ida walakanu labanawa.me nisa ape ratawal mehema dhanawadi path eke gihin gihin kawadahari amarikawa gawata eyi kiyala hithagena inna eka hudu sihinayak.me awawardhitha thathwaya kendraya ha paridhiya athara thibena adhipathi sabadathawaya pawathina thuru wenas wenne naha.pradhana paksha dekama pawathna sistam eka wisin bihikala eya wisin rakinu labana paksha nisa awawardhitha sistam ekata galapena hasirimak owungen apeksha kala haki wima swabhawikayi.
rate hathara dig bagaye inna prasiddha kridakayan nalu niliyan, deshapalanagnyayan owunge samipathama gnyathin magen beth aran thiyenawa.
manda yath obe awadhanaya drushti pathayen wiyuktha wi sanwadaya kerehi yomu wana heyini.
oya athare lokaya kiyana wadana ‘samajaya‘ kiyana arutha th denawa.
janadhipathiwaraya wisin ada ude 8.30ta paksha nayaka raswimak yoda thibuna.
me brithanya , amerika diyunu wenne aththatama ooka thibena nisa.
warak thamange anjanamakin apuru athhada balimak karanna me raththaran hamita hithuna.
"dushtayage charithetada?"kalin lasthi karagena sitiyak men wegawath pilithurak labuni.
nisi prathikara ema sthanayema sidu kala sanekin thuwalakaru ampara rohala wetha ragena giyeya.
eya nidahas welawata karanne gedarata wela eyage winodanshaya wechcha, githa rachanaya karana ekayi niwaduwak labunu gamanma.
namuth api paryeshana karala ape rate masa dekahamare pudina wi heyagena thiyenawa namuth ee soyaganim gowiya wetha yanne na api ee sandaha yanthranayak hadanawa.
sinhala bauddha sanskruthiyehi pradhana sanrachakaya yayi kiwahaki yaksha sanskruthiyehi nayakayan dewathwayen pidima da weyi.
wage dewal katha karanna,
mama me de kiwe guwan widuliye giyapu danwimak nisa.

kolambaa nagaraya thula adu pahasukam sahitha niwasawala jiwathwana ha anawasara padinchikaruwange pramanaya laksha 5k pamana wana bawath anawasara padinchikaruwan athulu siyalu ma dena kolambain pitathata yawimata katayuthu nokarana bawath kolambaa nagaraya thula ma ema pawulwalata wasasthanayata sudusu sthira niwasa wadapiliwelak athigaru janadhipathithumage upades paridi ka්riyathmaka kara thibena bawath niwasa, idikirim, injineru sewa, niwasa ha podu pahasukam amathya wimal wirawansha mahatha prakasha kaleya.
siduwi athi yamak yantham pahadili wemin thibunu bawin mala aneth mamath ekawarama mese asimu.
